Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near 95th/Union
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Ashland and 95th due to street blockage near 95th/Union.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Ashland and 95th due to street blockage near 95th/Union.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Logan Square
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
